tags: Real-time Reverse Transcription Polymerase Chain Reaction (RRT-PCR)
full_summary:
### Highly Pathogenic Avian Influenza Outbreak Testing Services

#### Contract Details

* Reference Number: WS3770350990-Doc3770407647
* Solicitation Number: WS3770350990
* Publication Date: January 5, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 23, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST (extended from initially posted deadline)

#### Project Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires avian influenza sample testing services from a certified laboratory in British Columbia. The contracted laboratory will conduct real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RRT-PCR) testing for the detection of avian influenza and generate reports of analysis (ROA) within a 24-hour turnaround time following sample receipt.

#### Service Requirements

The laboratory must meet the following service standards:

* Perform RRT-PCR testing for avian influenza at a certified facility in British Columbia.
* Generate ROA within 24 hours following sample receipt.
* Inform the CFIA of all testing results, including any positive findings, in a timely and efficient manner.

#### Contract Terms

* The contract term is expected to commence on January 6, 2023, and expiring on January 7, 2026.
* This contract is subject to the Trade Agreement referenced below.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to contractors participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Tender Notice and Contact Information

For additional information about this tender, please visit the official [Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15055907?extsite=MTUwNTU5MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) page.

The primary point of contact for this tender is:

* Kaine, Joshua (SPAC/PSPC)
* joshua.kaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
